title: Non - Verbal Hypnosis 🔥 Masterclass 2020
description:
Emanuele is Dr. Paret's student in his Masterclass in Nice this summer. He wanted to find greater potential in himself. Dr. Paret uses the power of nonverbal techniques to help Emanuele on his hypnotic journey. 

Dr. Marco Paret is the world's leading authority in Non-Verbal Hypnotism.
